## After class

âœ… **Complete these tasks:**

1. Make sure R and RStudio are installed and working
2. Create a new RStudio Project called "psy410"
3. Install the tidyverse package: `install.packages("tidyverse")`
4. Run `library(tidyverse)` and make sure it loads without errors
5. Try `glimpse(mpg)` to see your first dataset!
